article_title: U.S. Surgeon General teases new health care initiative (or maybe it's an infomercial) – twitchy.com
article_text:
What if I told you there is one thing you can do to improve your overall health? Well, there is one thing: #happiness.

— U.S. Surgeon General (@Surgeon_General) August 16, 2015
